directions: Combine tomato, beans, cucumber, and papaya in a large bowl. Toss with garlic and chile pepper.
Stir together lemon juice, lime juice, fish sauce, and sugar in a small bowl. Pour over papaya mixture and toss. Sprinkle peanuts and cilantro on top and serve.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups fresh green beans, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
1 fresh Thai or Serrano chile, finely minced
title: Thai-Inspired Confetti Salad
